name: Eggplant With Spicy Ginger Sauce
recipeYield: 4  side dish servings, 2  main dish servings
keywords: brown rice, eggplant, main course, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds unpeeled eggplant, cut into 1/4 -inch cubes
1/2 to 1 teaspoon Asian chili-garlic sauce or sambal

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add olive oil, then add onions, ginger and garlic. Cook, stirring, about 2 minutes. Add eggplant and cook, stirring, until lightly browned and tender, 8 to 10 minutes.

Add 6 tablespoons water, the ponzu, chili-garlic sauce, sesame oil and half the cilantro. Reduce heat to medium, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until eggplant is tender and liquid is absorbed. Serve hot, on brown rice, sprinkled with remaining cilantro.
